TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MetaDataMember extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示域对象的字段或属性与数据库表的列之间的映射。

span.span: Represents the mapping between a field or a property of a domain object into a column of a database table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示类似于外键到主键关系的数据库关联。This property represents a database association like a foreign-key to primary-key relationship.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DbType As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DbType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取相应数据库列的类型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of the corresponding database column.

value.span: 以字符串表示的数据库列的类型。

span.span: The type of the database column as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将是用于在 Transact-sql 表声明命令中定义列的确切文本。This will be the exact text used to define the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration command. 如果未如此定义，将从成员类型推断数据库列类型。If not so defined, the database column type is inferred from the member type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDbGenerated As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDbGenerated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是否由数据库自动生成。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member is automatically generated by the database.

value.span: 如果此成员是由数据库自动生成的，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if this member is automatically generated by the database; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在插入相应的数据行之后，自动生成的成员会立即同步。Automatically generated members are synchronized immediately after the corresponding data row is inserted. 不支持插入触发器生成的键值。Insert trigger-generated key values are not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDiscriminator As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDiscriminator { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是否表示继承鉴别器。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member represents the inheritance discriminator.

value.span: 如果此成员表示继承鉴别器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this member represents the inheritance discriminator; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性 `true` 最多可以是层次结构中最顶层映射类的一个成员。This property can be `true` for at most one member of the topmost mapped class in a hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsPersistent As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是否映射到列（或约束）。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member is mapped to a column (or constraint).

value.span: 如果此成员映射到列（或约束），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this member is mapped to a column (or constraint); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个类可以具有持久成员和非持久成员的组合。A class may have a combination of persistent and non-persistent members. 持久性成员将映射，而非持久成员不会映射。Persistent members are mapped while non-persistent members are not mapped. 映射的类必须具有至少一个持久性成员。A mapped class must have at least one persistent member.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsPrimaryKey As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsPrimaryKey { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是否属于该类型的标识。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member is part of the type's identity.

value.span: 如果此成员是类型标识的一部分，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this member is part of the type's identity; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为 `true` ，则类成员表示一个列，该列是表的唯一键的一部分。If this property is `true`, the class member represents a column that is part of the table's unique key. `true`对于作为关联列的复合的键，类的多个成员可以将此属性设置为。More than one member of the class can have this property set to `true` for a key that is a composite of the associated columns. 对于实体类，至少有一个成员必须具有此属性，并且应映射到相应的表或视图中的主键或唯一键。For an entity class, at least one member must have this attribute and should be mapped to the primary key or a unique key in the corresponding table or view. 否则，LINQ to SQL 会将类的实例视为只读，以将更改提交到数据库。Otherwise, LINQ to SQL considers instances of the class as read-only for the purpose of submitting changes to the database. 用标识的列集 不需要为主键。The set of columns identified with are not required to be the primary key. 它们只是表示唯一标识实体的集。They simply denote a set that uniquely identifies the entity. 常见的替代项包括聚集索引列或其他唯一键列。Common alternatives include clustering index columns or other unique key columns.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsVersion As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsVersion { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是表示行版本还是时间戳。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member represents the row version or timestamp.

value.span: 如果此成员表示行版本或时间戳，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this member represents the row version or timestamp; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当更新相关行时，版本号将递增并且时间戳列会更新。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated whenever the associated row is updated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UpdateCheck As UpdateCheck
public: abstract property System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck UpdateCheck { System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取此成员的开放式并发检查策略。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the optimistic concurrency check policy for this member.

value.span: 枚举值之一，该值指示此成员的开放式并发检查策略。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the optimistic concurrency check policy for this member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类没有 (设置为) 的版本成员 `true` ，则通过比较原始成员值和当前数据库状态来完成检测。If the class does not have a version member ( set to `true`), detection is done by comparing original member values with the current database state. 属性确定 LINQ to SQL 如何在开放式并发下实现冲突检测。The property determines how LINQ to SQL implements conflict detection under optimistic concurrency. 只有此属性设置为或的成员 才 会被视为冲突检测。Only those members with this property set to or are considered during conflict detection.
